item.description:
OK, this isn't hiking but the nights are getting longer and what better way to fill the night this Fall but with some good clean old fashioned dancing!

There will be "SHINDIGS AT THE BARN" Contra Dancing from 7 PM to 10 PM at the old Powder Mill Barn in Enfield, CT. Beginner's lessons from 6:30 PM to 7 PM. All are welcome to come to the event (married or single). You don't have to bring a partner. Casual dress (best no high heels, though). This venue is non-alcoholic. There is an $8 fee ($5 for students) the Barn charges for entry to cover their costs.

I want to experiment to see what this event is like and how it works for our group as something else we can do. If this works out well, I may add more such events to our schedule (once per month).

Please note there is an overall limit as to how many people can fit in the Barn so I have limited RSVP's. Just because you RSVP here does not necessarily mean there will be room in the Barn if you arrive late.


Location/directions to approximate meetup location at Powder Mill Barn (32 South Maple Street, Enfield, CT):
http://www.mapquest.c...

Powder Mill Barn:
860-749-4494
http://www.sweetheart...
Contra Dancing information:
http://www.sweetheart...

Definition of Contra Dancing:
http://en.wikipedia.o...

Video clip of some Contra Dancing
http://www.sweetheart...


=== Legal Stuff ===
By clicking on "Yes" or "Maybe" for this event you agree, warrant, and covenant as follows:

In consideration for accepting this entry, I, the registrant, intending to be legally bound, hereby, for myself, my heirs, my executors and administrators, do waive and release any and all rights for damages I may have against any parties or persons connected with the Hartford Area Hiking meetup group for and related to the above listed event. I attest and verify that I am physically fit to participate in any portion of this above listed event. I grant Hartford Area Hiking permission to use any photographs, film or videotapes of this event for any purpose.
